评论概述: Looks Great! Fits as designed - Could be better materials.
评论详情: I recently acquired the BODIY Punk Waist Harness Belt, and while it has its positives, it also has some notable drawbacks. Here's my take on this fashion accessory:  **Pros:**  1. **Fits Well:** One of the things I appreciated about this waist harness belt is that it fits well. The adjustable design ensures that it can accommodate various body shapes comfortably, which is essential for a body chain.  2. **Cute Appearance:** In terms of aesthetics, this belt does have a certain charm. It looks really cute when paired with the right outfit, especially for those who enjoy a punk, goth, or rave style. It can be a unique addition to your wardrobe.  **Cons:**  1. **Low-Quality Materials:** One of the significant drawbacks of this body chain is the quality of materials used. The materials feel somewhat low-end and not as durable as one might expect. This may result in quicker wear and tear, which is disappointing for a fashion accessory.  In conclusion, the BODIY Punk Waist Harness Belt has its merits, such as a good fit and a cute appearance that can enhance your fashion choices. However, the quality of materials used is notably lacking, which can affect its durability. If you're seeking a trendy addition to your wardrobe and don't mind a potential short lifespan, this body chain might be suitable for you. Just be prepared for some wear and tear over time.

this harness is pretty well made for what i paid for. no nicks or imperfections, and sturdy. the only issue i have with it is that it is not big person friendly. i can adjust the shoulders fine to fit my shoulders and chest but the waist belts were disappointingly too small. couldn’t even get it around me completely to even try the first hole on the belt. I received the harness all wrapped up in a cute little package with a cute little card regarding the return policy (which was really nice), which made taking it out of the package a little confusing; took me a few solid minutes to figure out how it was supposed to be adjusted 😅 but that was user error.  Now, I'm a bigger girl with a wide rib cage (roughly size 18 pants, wearing between a Large and XL shirts). I was wary that this harness would still fit me; but upon trying it on, it was fantastic. My partner absolutely loved it. I could wear it with just a shirt and no bra and had enough structure and stability (bonus!)  Only down side was that some of the material was pulling up upon taking out of the package before I even tried it on. Not a huge deal and I'm not worried about the structural integrity of the item, but I'll have to keep an eye on it with prolonged use.  Quite happy with the product!
Love it and it’s comfortable. Plenty of options to adjust size as well

I got this for Halloween and it served for the purpose. I wanted to try wearing a harness and opted to get this as it was not pricy. Of course I had assumed that it would feel cheap and it does but so far I have worn it multiple times after Halloween and it’s still going strong. If you are looking for a cheap harness just to try or to get the feel of wearing one, I would recommend this. But if you are a long time harness wearer and looking for good quality, skip this.
The harness was what I expected it to be. Not the best quality but it’s still cute
Very cheap very flimsy made all of my outfits look like a costume

For the price this thing is pretty good. Of course it's not real leather so just be mindful of pulling too hard or scratching or getting it wet. It's very adjustable which is nice, the pleather is soft (not stretchy) but not hard enough where it pushes into you when you tighten it. Very comfortable. I like that you can slide everything to adjust it, even where the shoulder pieces lay. Usually suspender type harnesses are very awkward on my chest, but I love that I can pull these over to the sides so they're a little more discreet.

评论概述: Does NOT FIT if you’re plus size
评论详情: I’m a size 1x in shirts size 18 in dresses and this did not fit. So sad I have to returned it.

It’s adorable, but the shoulder straps were installed upside down, so the “wrong” side of the leather is facing outward while the correct side is against my body. Probably still wear it, but as you can see it’s a pretty visual difference since the waist part was put together correctly, so it’s pretty obvious.
It's cute but I'm bit onthe heave side so It did fit a bit tight on me. But it's very cute
It has potential to be cute but mine was missing a buckle so it can’t even be worn.

I was a little concerned that it wouldn't fit when I first got it out of the bag, but it did. My waist is in the ballpark of 38". Once I had it buckled, I actually had it on the 5th or 6th holes on both belts, fitting directly underbust (I'm a 38C), which looks good if you've got a decent bra for lift or your girls naturally sit upward. It will definitely work for the costume I have planned.  Two minor issues: There are a LOT of holes to choose from, which is great, but many of them are not punched all the way through, which wasn't a problem for me because i needed holes that are punched completely. However, if you're not lucky, you may have to punch them yourself to get it to fit. It doesn't look like it would be too hard with a small nail or similar.  The second issue I had is that it was rolled up backwards in the package. Instead of being rolled with the finished side on the outside of the roll, so the "memory" of the material curves inward towards your body, it was rolled with the unfinished side on the outside of the roll, so the ends of the straps stick out awkwardly. My event isn't for a few days, so I've got the ends rolled in for the time being to try to train the straps ends to point towards my body. So I would recommend buying a few days ahead of time so you have time to correct the straps so it doesn't look sloppy and awkward. It's pretty common sense to roll belts with the rough side facing in, so I'm not sure why it was packaged this way. Maybe it was a fluke.  Overall it seems worth the money. It seems pretty sturdy for the price and it looks good on.
Glad I got it! Nicer in person then in photos and fits me size 16/18 with HH chest.
It came broken. The material is so cheap.
Absolutely perfect!

评论概述: A great starter harness if you're not sure if you want one or not!
评论详情: I bought this because I couldn't decide if I was a "harness girl" or not, but this one is definitely cute and super adjustable! It's a great entry price without paying the big bucks for a real leather one and still has the style! it definitely feels a little plasticky but you get what you pay for here.  One thing is if you're on the smaller side, I can see the tails of the belts being way too long for you. I have about a 31" waist and have so much excess belt that I actually ended up cutting some off.

I’m someone with a mid/plus size body (XL-2X for my tops) so I was worried if this would fit comfortably; and it does and everyone. There’s room to adjust and it goes around under my chest well and fits over my chest (42DD) comfortably. I’m glad it turned out so well!

评论概述: Very little stretch, but easily adjustable.
评论详情: This is a piece I've wanted to add to my collection for some time, but was wary on it due to being on the curvier side.  However this piece exceeded my expectations!  The two straps on the underbust/waist are nicely adjustable and can go on the underbust or waist depending on where you wish things to sit  The shoulder straps are so easily adjustable too, and don't dig in at all.  I've worn them for hours at a time with no complaints, receiving many compliments on it!  Definitely worth the money.For reference, my waist ranges from a 38-41 (I have a chronic illness which makes me fluctuate quite rapidly) and this piece accommodates it easily!

I bought this because I bought the green dress and in my head I heard Sammi say, “needs a harness” after I tried it on.  I needed something affordable because I wasn’t sure I was going to be a harness girl. But I loved it. Added structure to the dress. Was adjustable. I’m size L/xl with maybe a 36/38 C bra size.

I measured around my midsection at a 40” and this did fit! I was on the 2nd or 3rd to last hole so not bad! But very cute and versatile! Love it! (Wasn’t for the top I had on but was trying that on too lol)
I generally wear size 0-2 30DD, and this was absolutely huge on me. Ended up giving it away, but the material was nicer than expected

评论概述: Great Item for a Great Price!
评论详情: I was hesitant to buy this at first because my measurements aren't listed as what this will fit, but for the price, I took a chance and I'm so glad I did!! I am 5'5, 245lbs, 42DDD, and a 40in waist. I was able to wear it at the second notch of the front straps and had plenty of room at the arms. It did have a heavy smell to it when I first opened it, but I put it outside for a few hours and it dissipated. The harness was everything and very comfortable. I could bend, squat, and dance the night away with zero problems. It seems surprisingly durable and is definitely worth the money!!

评论概述: Elevates an outfit, not sure for how long
评论详情: Ok I was skeptical about trying a harness having the street cred of a carrot after I brushed out my dreadlocks of 6.5 years. So glad I bought this one. This one fits great and honestly elevates any outfit. For reference I’m 5’7” roughly 155 lbs and this has so much adjustability. It could go much smaller or much larger if needed. For the price I wasn’t expecting super nice real leather (those can be spendy) but I am a little curious how this will wear over time. Be aware if you wear it with white and sweat it has the potential to rub off/stain. Overall I consider this a great buy! Now please make one with brass clasps :)

I bought this harness hoping it would fit based on the measurements provided, with the expectation that I would probably need to add some holes to extend the waist. But surprisingly I actually fit into it with room to spare! For context I'm a size 18 US and have a 41 inch waist. Because you can adjust both the arm holes and the position of them, I think it helps the harness fit a pretty a pretty wide range of folks. For example I have larger arms/wider back and I was able to move the angle of the arms closer in so there was more room on the back.  That being said there isn't a ton of extra belt for holes to be added, if you need. The "leather" is actually a pretty decent quality for the price thought and the look of the harness is great.
I had to cut an extra hole to make it fit but it was perfect!
